roleset.name: move slightly
roleset.note: EDGE-V NOTES: Things seem to edge up more than they edge down, but this might justbe due to the performance of the stock market at the time.Treebank tags "up X%" inconsistently; sometimes it's (correctly) twoconstituents, sometimes it's one ADVP. You'll need to split apart theADVP to get to the argm-dir and arg2-ext. Bummer. (from edge.01-v)

example.name: just thing moving
example.text: Tokyo stocks edged up Wednesday in relatively active but unfocused trading.
example.arg: in relatively active but unfocused trading

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: That decline was reflected in revenue for the GM Hughes unit, which *trace* edged down to $2.58 billion from $2.63 billion.

example.name: all args
example.text: Revenue edged up 3.4% to $904 million from $874 million in last year's third quarter.

roleset.name: provide an edge or frame for an object
roleset.note: EDGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'edge' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to other verbs-of-incremental-movement. (from edge.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: Passive
example.text: As for the imperial clubs, according to The Book of Chuiwan, they-1 were edged *-1 with pure gold, inlaid with jade, and their shafts sumptuously decorated *.

example.name: all args
example.text: John edged out Mary for the last piece of birthday cake.
example.arg: for the last piece of birthday cake

roleset.name: hip, pushing the envelope
roleset.note: EDGY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from edgy.01-j)

example.name: typical
example.text: I do n't know if they though they were being edgy , but that 's a pretty stupid thing to print .

example.name: arg1
example.text: For what it's worth I think it was me and I thought that haircut was edgy and looked really cool.

roleset.name: on edge, high strung
roleset.note: EDGY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on similar adjectives relating to the amuse-31.1 VNcls (even though 'edgy' doesn't have a corresponding verb). (from edgy.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: He was edgy from the tension, and his staff avoided him as much as possible.
